sonicsword.name: Sonic Sword
sonicsword.desc: Does wind-based magical damage, effective against flying units.

runesword.name: Runesword
runesword.desc: Does light-based magical damage, restores user's HP equal to damage done to enemy.

amiti.name: Amiti
amiti.desc: Elincia only. Strikes twice, grants Defense +3 and Resistance +3.

alondite.name: Alondite
alondite.desc: Black knight only. Negates non-wrath criticals and grants Defense +5.

regalsword.name: Regal Sword
regalsword.desc: Ike only. Effective against armors and cavalry.

ragnell.name: Ragnell
ragnell.desc: Ike only. Negates goddess blessing and non-wrath criticals, grants Defense +5.

flamelance.name: Flame Lance
flamelance.desc: Does fire-based magical damage, effective against beast laguz.

boltaxe.name: Bolt Axe
boltaxe.desc: Does thunder-based magical damage and effective against dragon laguz.

onager.name: Onager
onager.desc: Archer/Sniper only. Ignores user's strength, damages surrounding enemies, always hits and cannot crit.

rexbolt.name: Rexbolt
rexbolt.desc: Effective against dragon laguz, grants Skill +3.

rexcalibur.name: Rexcalibur
rexcalibur.desc: Effective against flying units, grants Luck +3.

nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
nosferatu.desc: Restores user's HP equal to damage done to enemy.

heal.name: Heal
heal.desc: Restores an ally's HP. HP restored = [Mag + 10]

mend.name: Mend
mend.desc: Restores an ally's HP. HP restored = [Mag + 20]

torch.name: Torch
torch.desc: Increases user's sight in fog of war (effect lowers each turn).

ward.name: Ward
ward.desc: Raises an ally's resistance (effect lowers each turn).

hammerne.name: Hammerne
hammerne.desc: Repairs an ally's weapon to full uses.

silence.name: Silence
silence.desc: Seals the enemy's ability to use magic.

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc: Brings an allied unit next to the user.

warp.name: Warp
warp.desc: Teleports an ally to a traversable square.

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.desc: Restores HP of all allies within range.

asherastaff.name: Ashera Staff
asherastaff.desc: Fully restores HP and status condition of all allies.

laguzstone2uses.name: Laguz Stone (2 uses)
laguzstone2uses.desc: Allows laguz to change to animal form straight away.

laguzstone1use.name: Laguz Stone (1 use)
laguzstone1use.desc: Allows laguz to change to animal form straight away.

masterseal.name: Master Seal
masterseal.desc: Allows most units to class change at level 10 or above.

armsscroll.name: Arms Scroll
armsscroll.desc: Permanently raises the weapon level of the equipped weapon's type by 1 rank.

occultscroll.name: Occult Scroll
occultscroll.desc: Teaches promoted units a class-specific mastery skill.

paragonscroll.name: Paragon Scroll
paragonscroll.desc: Astrid and Geoffrey only. Teaches paragon.

cantoscroll.name: Canto Scroll
cantoscroll.desc:
Transformed Herons only. Teaches canto
Note: Due to Herons not being able to transform while in the Base, this item cannot be actually used.

laguzguard.name: Laguzguard
laguzguard.desc: Beorc only. Halves damage taken from laguz attacks.

beorcguard.name: Beorcguard
beorcguard.desc: Laguz only. Negates effective bonus of laguz-killing weapons towards user.

knightward.name: Knight Ward
knightward.desc: Knights, Generals, Cavaliers, Paladins, Soldiers and Halberdiers only. Grants Defense +2, Resistance +2, Speed Growth +30%.

demiband.name: Demi Band
demiband.desc: Can be used by any Laguz except Reyson. Allows user to stay permanently in animal form, but with reduced stats.

laguzband.name: Laguz Band
laguzband.desc: Tibarn, Naesala and Giffca only. Allows laguz to stay transformed permanently.

knightring.name: Knight Ring
knightring.desc: Allows user to use up leftover movement after performing an action.
